### [Instance Methods](/documentation/Swift/Double/Strideable-Implementations#Instance-Methods)

[`func advanced(by: Double) -> Double`](/documentation/swift/double/advanced(by:))Returns a value that is offset the specified distance from this value.[`func distance(to: Double) -> Double`](/documentation/swift/double/distance(to:))Returns the distance from this value to the given value, expressed as a stride.### [Type Aliases](/documentation/Swift/Double/Strideable-Implementations#Type-Aliases)

[`typealias Stride`](/documentation/swift/double/stride)A type that represents the distance between two values.
